data.title: Prof. Amit Kumar
data.text:
Professor (Dr.) Amit Kumar

Designation: Professor

Date of Joining: 29 Dec. 2023

Email: This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.

ORCID: https://orcid.org/0000-0002-4582-5677

Google Scholar: https://scholar.google.co.in/citations?user=qR0tCrIAAAAJ&hl=en

Academic Record & Distinction

M.A. (Geography), M.Sc. (Geoinformatics), P.G. Diploma (Remote Sensing & GIS)

UGC National Eligible Test (Geography)

Ph.D. (Remote Sensing), Birla Institute of Technology, Mesra

Ph.D. Topic: ‘Assessment and Comparative Evaluation of Urban Environment of Ranchi Township’

Editor, SN Social Sciences (published by Springer Nature)

Review Editor of the Conservation and Restoration Ecology (special section of Frontiers in Ecology and Evolution, Frontiers in Environmental Science, and Frontiers in Plant Science)

Awards:

Recipient of Fulbright-Nehru Academic and Professional Excellence Fellowships (Research) 2023-2024 in May 2023 by United States-India Educational Foundation (USIEF).

Fellow of the Society for Science of Climate Change and Sustainable Environment (FSSCE), New Delhi, 2021.

Young Scientist Award (2020), SSCE, New Delhi.

SERB – ITSS to participate in GFBI-FECS Joint symposium at BFU, 2017.

Honorary External Expert Member for Research Advisory Committee for Forest Geoinformatics of the FRI University, Dehradun at the Institute of Forest Productivity, Ranchi.

Commission Member 2017-2020 & 2021-2025- International Union for Conservation of Nature - Commission of Ecosystem Management (IUCN-CEM)

Research Interests:

Urban Growth and Ecosystem Dynamics,

Weather extremes, Urban Hazards-Risk,

Biogeography, Forest dynamics, Himalayan Ecosystem

Remote Sensing & GIS

Research Guidance:

PhD Research: 03 Awarded, 01 Submitted, 01 Ongoing

M.Sc. Dissertation: 59 Awarded

Summary of Publications & Projects:

Publications in Journals: 81.

Book chapters: 38.

Edited Books: 03.

Research projects: 09 completed (NISAR, AVIRIS, GISAT, DBT, etc.), 02 ongoing (LTEO)

Book Publication (Selected):

Kumar A, Srivastava PK, Saikia P, Mall RK. (eds.) (2023). Earth Observation in Urban Monitoring: Techniques and Challenges. Elsevier Inc. ISBN: 9780323991643. Available at URL: https://www.sciencedirect.com/book/9780323991643/earth-observation-in-urban-monitoring’.
